data.name: World of Warships — Welcome Gift
data.detailed_description:
The DLC contains 300 000 credits, the “Vive la France” collection container, and the “German Destroyers” collection container. When you start a collection, you can get its collectibles from daily containers if you check this option in the Collections menu in your Port.

It’s free for everyone. Let’s take a closer look:

300 000 credits

Credits are the main in-game currency used to purchase warships, as well as obtain modules and upgrades.

The “Vive la France” container includes:

  • Two collectible items from the “Vive la France” collection;
  • 7x economic signals of the same type; or 1 250 Free XP; or “Revolutionary” camouflage.

The “German Destroyers” container includes:

  • One element of the “German Destroyers” collection;
  • 3x economic signals of the same type; or 1 250 Free XP; or “Black, White, Red” camouflage.

You will be able to use this DLC only if you play from the game account created on Steam.

data.short_description: The DLC contains 300 000 credits, the “Vive la France” collection container, and the “German Destroyers” collection container.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Czech, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Spain*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian, Dutch*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.66 GHz, Core i3 2.5 GHz, AMD Athlon II X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 440/630, AMD Radeon HD 7660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 62 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 SP1 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz, AMD FX 6350 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 65 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11.1
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080
